description: This table contains the trace of billing actions related to voiding a charge on the specimen.

columns.name: SPECIMEN_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier (.1 item) for the specimen record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: CM_PHY_OWNER_ID
columns.description: The Community ID (CID) of the instance that owns this record or line. This is only populated if you use IntraConnect.

columns.name: MESSAGE_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the universal charge message associated with the voided or reposted charge.

columns.name: TEST_LINE
columns.description: The line number of the test associated with the voided or reposted charge.
